article.title: Teacher's view
article.para: The teacher view will expand the basic elements by the following teacher functions.

section.title: Dashboard
section.para: On this site you can see all courses, which you lecture. Besides you can add a new course by completing the form, which will open by clicking on the link.
At the bottom of the dashboard you see a list of all students that are subscribed to your courses.

section.title: Course
section.para: For every of your courses you can see its survey. Moreover you can create a new lesson by completing the form, which will open by clicking on the link.
Of course you can see the students that are subscribed to that course.
